Customizable Card Dimensions

Small Card

Medium Card

Large Card

Full Width Card

Tall Card

Square Card

Draggable Card

Usage Example

<CustomizableCard 
  width={400}        // or "100%" for responsive
  height={300}       // or "auto" for content-based
  title="My Card"
  draggable={true}   // optional
  className="custom-class"  // optional
  style={{ borderRadius: '20px' }}  // optional
>
  <YourContent />
</CustomizableCard>
